mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_act_stnd.select */ SELECT act_cd /* act_cd 활동_코드 character varying(20) */ ,act_clss_cd /* act_clss_cd 활동_분류_코드 character varying(20) */ ,act_nm /* act_nm 활동_명 character varying(40) */ ,act_desc /* act_desc 활동_설명 character varying(1000) */ ,met_val /* met_val MET_값 numeric */ ,met_min_cfct /* met_min_cfct MET_분당_환산계수 numeric */ ,sort_ord /* sort_ord 정렬_순서 numeric */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ti_act_stnd WHERE 1 = 1 AND act_cd = #{actCd} /* act_cd 활동_코드 character varying(20) */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_act_stnd.insert */ INSERT INTO ti_act_stnd ( act_cd /* act_cd 활동_코드 character varying(20) */
,act_clss_cd /* act_clss_cd 활동_분류_코드 character varying(20) */
,act_nm /* act_nm 활동_명 character varying(40) */
,act_desc /* act_desc 활동_설명 character varying(1000) */
,met_val /* met_val MET_값 numeric */ ,met_min_cfct /* met_min_cfct MET_분당_환산계수 numeric */ ,sort_ord /* sort_ord 정렬_순서 numeric */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ) VALUES ( #{actCd} /* act_cd 활동_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{actClssCd} /* act_clss_cd 활동_분류_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{actNm} /* act_nm 활동_명 character varying(40) */
,#{actDesc} /* act_desc 활동_설명 character varying(1000) */
,#{metVal} /* met_val MET_값 numeric */ ,#{metMinCfct} /* met_min_cfct MET_분당_환산계수 numeric */ ,#{sortOrd} /* sort_ord 정렬_순서 numeric */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ )
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_act_stnd.update */ UPDATE ti_act_stnd
,act_clss_cd = #{actClssCd} /* act_clss_cd 활동_분류_코드 character varying(20) */
,act_nm = #{actNm} /* act_nm 활동_명 character varying(40) */
,act_desc = #{actDesc} /* act_desc 활동_설명 character varying(1000) */
,met_val = #{metVal} /* met_val MET_값 numeric */
,met_min_cfct = #{metMinCfct} /* met_min_cfct MET_분당_환산계수 numeric */
,sort_ord = #{sortOrd} /* sort_ord 정렬_순서 numeric */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND act_cd = #{actCd} /* act_cd 활동_코드 character varying(20) */

,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
